content:
I've attempted to merge master into bump/v4.8.0, in preparation for (finally!) making a PR to bump/v4.8.0 from nightly-testing.

Unfortunately, however, I'm struggling to get bump/v4.8.0 to work. I don't think it is strictly necessary that it work, however! I propose that we just proceed with a PR from nightly-testing to bump/v4.8.0, and get that green.
